text: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَتَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

translation.en: May Allah pardon you, [O Muhammad]; why did you give them permission [to remain behind]? [You should not have] until it was evident to you who were truthful and you knew [who were] the liars
translation.id: Allah memaafkanmu (Muhammad). Mengapa engkau memberi izin kepada mereka (untuk tidak pergi berperang), sebelum jelas bagimu orang-orang yang benar-benar (berhalangan) dan sebelum engkau mengetahui orang-orang yang berdusta
